head.title: Granton Area School District | Granton, WI

div.h2: School Building Closure Through End Of School Year

div.div: Due to COVID-19 and the Safer at Home order Granton Area School District will continue E-Learning until the conclusion of the calendar year on May 29th.

div.h2: Welcome to Granton Area School District
div.p: Our Vision at Granton Area School District is to attract new families and serve as a model of student excellence for communities everywhere.
